column14: TRVN I was reading over the briefing docs again regarding Qt and that thing is a real mystery Oli and its metabolites doesnt directly cause the Qt prolongation but the magnitude of Qt prolongation is dose dependent at least initially Its also odd that if Oli was the cause the Phase 3 and Athena would have shown consistent instances of Qt prolongation at the 24 hour mark due to cumulative effect at regulatory concerning levels Phase 3 didnt show any However in Athena with over 700 patients there were only 22 instances of Qt prolongation that went above 10ms not all that could be attributed to Oli The new Qt tests results will be interesting to see

TRVN The Qt study result will be a major stock mover since it is the main safety concern that the FDA and several members of the adcom had Once it is proven that Oli does not cause any meaningful Qt prolongation the chances of approval increased significantly

TRVN Is no one going to talk about the max single dose in the Qt Study They set it at 3mg and a accumulative total dose of 27mg in 24 hours At that level Qt prolongation is going to be insignificant I think the company study design is overkill Its as if they are going out of their way to prove to the FDA wrong
